issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: appcd
components.description: Bootstrap, appcd CLI commands (start, stop, restart, exec, logcat, config, status)

fields.description:
{{appcd exec}} currently only supports dispatching "call" requests. It does not support "subscribe" requests. {{appcd exec}} needs a {{\-\-subscribe}} flag.

When the {{\-\-subscribe}} flag is set, it will pass a "type" of "subscribe" with the request, then the {{appcd exec}} command will need to properly not exit until the connection is closed or the {{fin}} event is emitted.
fields.summary: appcd: Implement subscription requests from appcd CLI
